component.name: Omnicom
component.summary: Modern graphical interface for serial communication via picocom

description.p: Omnicom is a modern and elegant graphical interface for serial communication. It provides an intuitive way to configure and establish serial connections using picocom as the backend.

ul.li: Modern graphical interface with PyQt6
Automatic serial port detection
Support for serial ports (/dev/ttyS*) and USB adapters (/dev/ttyUSB*)
Complete serial parameter configuration (baud rate, data bits, parity, stop bits, flow control)
Baud rates from 300 to 921600 bps
Opens connection in system default terminal

description.p: Traceroute / MTR visualization and network improvements

ul.li: Add Traceroute / MTR tab with graphical route visualization
Redesign route visualization with glowing neon bars and hover effects
Redesign latency graph with premium dark/neon aesthetic
Add new icons for route graphics tab
Improve SNMP results table with context menu and clearer button labels
Enhance ARP scanning with hostname resolution and improved UI
Add automatic cap_net_raw capability configuration for traceroute binary
Optimize GUI layout and tab navigation
